snippet: The government of Turkey appears to be joining the list of countries making more concerted demands of the United States for the return of antiquities believed to have been looted and exported illegally, The Los Angeles Times reported.
abstract: The government of Turkey appears to be joining the list of countries making more concerted demands of the United States for the return of antiquities believed to have been looted and exported illegally, The Los Angeles Times reported.

headline.main: Turkey Steps Up Demands for Antiquities in U.S. Museums
headline.print_headline: Turkey Pressing Case on Looted Antiquities
